code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';const initialState={usuario:null};const userSlice=createSlice({name:'login_registro',initialState,reducers:{setUser:(state,action)=>{console.log("Esto es lo que se recibe en UserSlice.js:",action.payload);state.usuario=action.payload;},logoutUser:state=>{console.log("Logging out user, resetting state...");state.usuario=null;}}});export const{setUser,logoutUser}=userSlice.actions;export default userSlice.reducer;
